item.description:
Hi Everyone,

We will be reading Ape House by Sara Gruen for our August book discussion. Here is a brief description...When a family of bonobo apes who know American Sign Language are kidnapped from a language laboratory, their mysterious appearance on a reality TV show propels scientist Isabel Duncan, together with reporter John Thigpen, on a personal mission to rescue them. An entertaining book that calls into question our assumptions about these animals who share 99.4% of our DNA. Hope you enjoy the book!

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: August Book Discussion
